org.qcri.rheem.core.optimizer.cardinality

Interface CardinalityEstimator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AggregatingCardinalityEstimator, DefaultCardinalityEstimator, FallbackCardinalityEstimator, FixedSizeCardinalityEstimator, SwitchForwardCardinalityEstimator, TextFileSource.CardinalityEstimator
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface CardinalityEstimator
    Computes CardinalityEstimates.

    To estimate the cardinality of an Operator's OutputSlot given its InputSlots' cardinalities is the job of this estimator.

      CardinalityEstimate estimate(OptimizationContext optimizationContext, CardinalityEstimate... inputEstimates)
